description: Primes p such that x^4 = 2 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A040098 relative to A000040. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 17 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_]:= Reduce[Mod[x^4 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False;Select[Prime[Range[100]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 17 2012  *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(500) | not exists{x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^4 eq 2} ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 17 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
